thread.title: Dancing with the Stars' Val and Maks Chmerkovskiy Are Heading to Fuller House
thread.title_full: Dancing with the Stars' Val and Maks Chmerkovskiy Are Heading to Fuller House - seattlepi.com

author: Liz Raftery, TV GUIDE
title: Dancing with the Stars' Val and Maks Chmerkovskiy Are Heading to Fuller House
text:
Looks like a sibling double date is in the works for Fuller House .
Dancing with the Stars ' heartthrobs Maks and Val Chmerkovskiy will guest-star in an episode of the Netflix revival, Us Weekly reports. The brothers will play dancers who are the love interests of sisters Stephanie ( Jodie Sweetin ) and D.J. ( Candace Cameron -Bure ), and dance with them at a club.
Val will play Stephanie's beau, while Maks will pair off with D.J., according to Us .
Cameron-Bure made it to the final three on Dancing with the Stars in 2014, paired with Mark Ballas . Back in August, she shared a video on Instagram that showed her rehearsing with Val.
When @iamvalc helps you fly ??
A video posted by Candace Cameron Bure (@candacecbure) on Aug 20, 2015 at 11:03am PDT
Are you looking forward to seeing the Chmerkovskiy brothers on Fuller House ?
